          <title>
            <string language="en">The wandering Magnetic Pole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der wandering Magnetpol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Pôle magnétique errant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O pólo magnético vagueando</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο περιπλαμένος μαγνητικός Πολωνός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El polo magnético que vaga</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which shows the change in position of the Magnetic pole from 1945 to 2000</string>
